level.heading: Assignment of District rights.
level.text: The Mayor may assign the opportunity to purchase provided under this subchapter to a person that:

Demonstrates the capacity to own and manage, either by itself or through a management agent, the housing accommodation and related facilities for the remaining useful life of the housing accommodation; and
Agrees to obligate itself and any successors in interest to maintain the affordability of the assisted housing development as required by ยง 42- 3404.33.
